Beginner Full Body Split

Focus on mastering basic movements and building consistency (3 days/week).

This 3-day full-body split is perfect for beginners. Focus on proper form over lifting heavy weight initially. Aim for one rest day between workouts.

Workout Day (e.g., Mon/Wed/Fri)

  • Squats (Goblet or Barbell): 3 sets x 8-12 reps
  • Push-ups (or Knee Push-ups): 3 sets x As Many Reps As Possible (AMRAP)
  • Dumbbell Rows: 3 sets x 10-15 reps per side
  • Overhead Press (Dumbbell or Barbell): 3 sets x 8-12 reps
  • Plank: 3 sets x 30-60 seconds hold
  • Optional: Bicep Curls: 2 sets x 10-15 reps
  • Optional: Tricep Extensions: 2 sets x 10-15 reps

Rest Day

Focus on light activity like walking, stretching, or mobility work. Ensure good nutrition and sleep.

); }; export default BeginnerSplit;
